original_title: The Beautiful Aquarium: Tranquil World - Relaxation with Music & Nature
overview: The Beautiful Aquarium is designed for people who want to relax. It is great to watch or just leave on as a background for life. It is designed for people who want an exciting aquarium in their home without all the fuss. (Virtual Aquarium)
title: The Beautiful Aquarium: Tranquil World - Relaxation with Music & Nature
